Choose your own plans, toward the movement goal.
Choose the day of exercise according to your own rhythm.

After a week of time can increase, an increase of 10% on the basis of the principles of the original. For example, the first four weeks of training every 30 minutes, we recommend that the first five weeks of training each time not more than 33 minutes.
Excessive training can affect health, we must pay attention to rest.

What is cross-training? Running, other types of exercise, helps strengthen muscles, heart and lung levels of state, can be counted as cross-training. Recommend swimming, cycling. Not recommended confrontational ball games, lead to injury easily.

The first Bluetooth headset with intelligent movement APP functions inherent subvert your perception of the MP3 player, the definition of a new lifestyle, highlight your personality and style.
Driving talk a good helper, automatic sync contacts, caller name display, a key answer, call quality, intelligent call recording at any time.
Built-in sensor, motion pedometer function automatically calculates the moving distance and energy consumption, tailored to your exercise program, to create a personal fitness trainer.
Built-in high-capacity storage space, to enjoy high quality music playback. Better connect the phone to enjoy music anytime, anywhere edification.
The first function of intelligent Bluetooth watch with APP, stylish atmosphere, and beautiful to use, change wearable devices, so you can enjoy the wisdom of business life on the wrist.
Ink screen displays fine, long standby. Message notification, call reminders, SMS reading, anytime, at your fingertips.
Gestures pictures, looking for positioning, bluetooth anti-lost, receive calls, a list in hand, relaxed life.
The most intelligent lightweight Bluetooth headset sports, so you get rid of the fetters of cable, outside the hustle and bustle, the freedom to listen to music, sports fun in life.
Ergonomic design, with lightweight neckband memory, wear fit, firm and comfortable; shaft folding, retractable, in one hand, into the bag accompanying.

Pushing firmware to the device now, please do not navigate away from this page and reset your device manually after completion to start firmware upgrading.
Pushing firmware to the device has been completed?
Red light is on during the upgrade process, please wait for about three minutes, and then short press the power button, if the red light is off, it means the upgrade is completed.
Your smart device has newer firmware to upgrade, click here to upgrade
